variants.Description in input context: Three PD-linked point mutations in α-synuclein (SNCA) are mentioned, but specific nucleotide changes are not detailed in the text.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Pulsed dipolar ESR (Electron Spin Resonance) measurements

Material used.Description: The study uses α-synuclein variants to measure structural dynamics under different conditions (e.g., detergent micelles).

Readout description.Result Description: The method measures inter-spin distances up to 8.7 nm to infer structural conformations of α-synuclein. No specific variant effects are quantified in the text.

Biological replicates.Description: The text does not specify biological replicates for this experiment.

Technical replicates.Description: The text does not specify technical replicates for this experiment.

Basic positive control.Description: The text does not mention a positive control for this experiment.

Basic negative control.Description: The text does not mention a negative control for this experiment.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Typical ESR signal-to-noise ratios (e.g., >3:1) for reliable distance measurements.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Signal-to-noise ratios <1:1 or inconsistent distance measurements.
